title: Build merklemart.com - Crypto Marketplace
description:
Create merklemart.com as a blockchain-powered marketplace.

## Features
1. **Product Listings** - List physical and digital products
2. **Crypto Payments** - Accept BTC, ETH, USDC, etc.
3. **Escrow System** - Secure transactions with smart contracts
4. **Seller Dashboard** - Inventory, orders, analytics
5. **Buyer Protection** - Dispute resolution system
6. **NFT Integration** - Sell NFTs alongside physical goods
7. **Merkle Proofs** - Verification system for authenticity

## Tech Stack
- Next.js frontend
- Node.js/Go backend
- PostgreSQL + Redis
- Web3 integration
- IPFS for decentralized storage

## Target Domain
- merklemart.com

## Related
- buildnft.xyz (NFT platform)
- digitaltokens.xyz (token platform)
- managedcrypto.com (crypto services)
testing_plan:
1. Test product listing flow
2. Test crypto payment flow (testnet)
3. Test seller onboarding
4. Test buyer purchase flow
5. Test escrow release
6. Verify NFT integration
rollback_plan: Remove DNS records and k8s deployment if issues occur. Use testnet for all crypto transactions during testing.
